question_text_en: What is the total duration of the activity where an agent brushes an object whose type is Toothbrush in the bathroom from 2024-04-09T05:36:00 to 2024-06-30T23:08:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:brush .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Toothbrush .
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "bathroom" .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-09T05:36:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-30T23:08:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                    }

question_text_en: What is the average duration involving an agent that squeezes an object whose state is CLOSED at a position where the X coordinate is less than 5.38 after or at 2024-05-13T15:38:00 and before 2024-06-06T12:42:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (AVG(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:squeeze .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:CLOSED .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
                    FILTER("5.38"^^xsd:double > ?pos_x)
                
                    
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-13T15:38:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-06T12:42:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                    }

question_text_en: What is the maximum Z coordinate of an object which is a subclass of Decor that an agent looks at in the livingroom for less than or equal to 17 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (MAX(?pos_z) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:lookAt .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration <= 17)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Decor .
            
                        
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                    }

query:

            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>

                        { select * where {

question_text_en: What is the total duration of the time an agent writes on an object whose type is Paper in the living room from 2024-05-18T05:06:00 to 2024-06-28T09:09:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:write .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Paper .
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-18T05:06:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-28T09:09:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                    }

qualifiers_en.object: an object whose type is Paper
qualifiers_en.question: What is the total duration?

question_text_en: What is the maximum X coordinate of an object whose state is OPEN that is closed by an agent at a position where the Y coordinate is less than 1.65 after or at 2024-05-04T14:38:00 and before 2024-05-31T10:50:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (MAX(?pos_x) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:close .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-04T14:38:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-05-31T10:50:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("1.65"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
                
                    
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:OPEN .
            
                        
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                    }

question_text_en: What is the minimum height of the object that an agent puts in inside the kitchen for less than or equal to 9 seconds, specifically an object whose type is Chicken?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (MIN(?size_y) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:putIn .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Chicken .
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration <= 9)
            
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "kitchen" .
            
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                
                    }

question_text_en: How many times per object is an agent soaking an object whose type is Waterglass at a position where the Y coordinate is less than 1.7 for more than 3 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?object (COUNT(distinct ?event) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:soak .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Waterglass .
                
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("1.7"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
                
                    
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration > 3)
            
                    } group by ?object

query:

            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>

            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (MIN(?pos_y) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:drink .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration <= 12)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Alcohol .
                
                        
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                    }

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.time: less than or equal to 12 seconds
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose type is Alcohol
qualifiers_en.question: What is the minimum Y coordinate of the an object whose type is Alcohol?

paraphrased_question_text_en: What is the lowest y-coordinate of an alcohol object that an agent drank in the living room for 12 seconds or less?

question_text_en: What is the total duration for an agent that writes on an object whose attribute is has_paper in the livingroom after 2024-05-20T10:04:00 and before 2024-06-26T09:33:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:write .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:has_paper .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-20T10:04:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-26T09:33:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                    }

question_text_en: How many times per object does an agent scrub an object whose type is Juice in the kitchen for more than 7 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?object (COUNT(distinct ?event) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:scrub .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Juice .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration > 7)
            
                    } group by ?object

question_text_en: What is the shortest duration involving an agent that sits on an object whose state is DIRTY in the toilet for more than or equal to 4 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (MIN(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:sit .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:DIRTY .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "toilet" .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration >= 4)

question_text_en: How many times does an agent shake an object whose type is Pillow at a position where the Y coordinate is greater than 0.21 for more than 10 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?event) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:shake .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Pillow .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration > 10)
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("0.21"^^xsd:double < ?pos_y)
                
                    
                    }

question_text_en: How many times per object does an agent walk with an object which is a subclass of Alcohol_1 inside the kitchen for less than 21 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?object (COUNT(distinct ?event) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:walk .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Alcohol_1 .
            
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "kitchen" .
            
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration < 21)
            
                    } group by ?object

query:

                    FILTER("1.32"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
                
                    
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:cream .
            
                        
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .

                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .

                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:open .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;

                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .

question_text_en: How long does an agent take to type an object whose state is PLUGGED_OUT in the livingroom?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:type .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:PLUGGED_OUT .
            
                    } }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time .
                    ?time time:numericDuration ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

question_text_en: From when to when does an agent shake an object whose state is DIRTY at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -8.16?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?begin_time ?end_time WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:shake .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:DIRTY .
            
                    } }
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-8.16"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
                
                    
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                    ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                    ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                    ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                    ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                
                } limit 1

            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:close .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:DIRTY .
            
                    } }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time .
                    ?time time:numericDuration ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

question_text_en: How long does it take for an agent to drink an object which is a subclass of Wine_1 at a position where the Y coordinate is less than 2.22?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:drink .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Wine_1 .
            
                    } }
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("2.22"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
                
                    
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time .
                    ?time time:numericDuration ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

question_text_en: From when to when does an agent sit on an object whose type is Bed in the bedroom?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?begin_time ?end_time WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:sit .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Bed .
                
                    } }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "bedroom" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                    ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                    ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                    ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                    ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the time when an agent drinks an object whose type is Waterglass at a position where the Y coordinate is greater than 0.99?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:drink .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Waterglass .
                
                    } }
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("0.99"^^xsd:double < ?pos_y)
                
                    
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                    ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                    ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the activity involving an agent that walks an object whose attribute is containers at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -3.97 for more than or equal to 4 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:walk .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration >= 4)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:containers .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-3.97"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
                
                    
                        ?answer vh2kg:hasEvent ?event .
                    } limit 1

query:

            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>

                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOn .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration >= 2)
            
                        } }

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Juice .
                
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
            
                    } order by desc(?end_time) }
                    
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:find .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:CLEAN .
            
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                    } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                    
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of an object whose attribute is has_plug that an agent interacts with by text for more than 14 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:text .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:has_plug .
            
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration > 14)
            
                    }  }
                    
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                } limit 1

PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:scrub .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:cream .
            
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                    } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                    
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of the object that an agent writes on, whose attribute is has_paper, in less than 17 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:write .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:has_paper .
            
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration < 17)
            
                    }  }
                    
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the place where an agent types an object whose attribute is has_plug after 2024-04-01T14:16:00 and before 2024-05-23T00:58:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:type .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:has_plug .
            
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-01T14:16:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-05-23T00:58:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                    }  }
                    ?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What are the start and end frames of the scene from camera3 involving an agent that pours an object which is a subclass of Alcohol_1 at a position where the Y coordinate is greater than 1.0 for less than or equal to 17 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                                ?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
                                
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration <= 17)
            
                                
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Alcohol_1 .
            
                                
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("1.0"^^xsd:double < ?pos_y)
                
                    
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera3_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
                    ?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .

                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
                    ?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
                } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>

            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                                ?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
                                
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-15T08:29:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-05-25T18:42:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                                
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Juice .
                
                                
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera2_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
                    ?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .

                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:soak .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-15T14:01:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-05-28T05:06:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Carrot_1 .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-3.57"^^xsd:double > ?pos_z)
                
                    
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera2_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>

            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {

                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-22T10:48:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-07-06T09:07:00"^^xsd:dateTime)

                    } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the video from camera1 involving an agent that switches off an object whose state is OPEN at a position where the X coordinate is greater than 0.1 for less than 15 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>

            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOff .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration < 15)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:OPEN .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
                    FILTER("0.1"^^xsd:double < ?pos_x)
                
                    
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera1_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the video from camera4 involving an agent that opens an object whose attribute is has_plug at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -7.87 from 2024-05-19T05:49:00 to 2024-06-06T18:01:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:open .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-19T05:49:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-06T18:01:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:has_plug .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-7.87"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
                
                    
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera4_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>

            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?visible_object ?pos2d WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (Max(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                            ?event vh2kg:action ac:type .
                            
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-07T11:48:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-04-18T23:19:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                            
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Keyboard .
                
                            
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "livingroom" .
            
                
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera4_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
                    ?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?bbox .
                    ?bbox a mssn:BoundingBoxDescriptor ;
                            vh2kg:bbox-2d-value ?pos2d ;
                        vh2kg:is2DbboxOf ?visible_object .
                }

question_text_en: What are the start and end frames of the scene from camera0 involving an agent that grabs an object whose type is Slippers at a position where the X coordinate is greater than -10.92 for less than 18 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                                ?event vh2kg:action ac:grab .
                                
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration < 18)
            
                                
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Slippers .
                
                                
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
                    FILTER("-10.92"^^xsd:double < ?pos_x)
                
                    
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera0_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
                    ?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .

                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
                    ?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
                } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>

            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:scrub .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-06-10T03:29:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-28T07:07:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:cream .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-8.69"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
                
                    
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera1_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>

            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?visible_object ?pos2d WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (Max(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                            ?event vh2kg:action ac:scrub .
                            
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-06-26T12:14:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-07-09T00:21:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                            
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:cover_object .
            
                            
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("0.32"^^xsd:double < ?pos_y)
                
                    
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera2_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
                    ?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?bbox .
                    ?bbox a mssn:BoundingBoxDescriptor ;

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:has_paper .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                        } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                        
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("0.97"^^xsd:double < ?pos_y)
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

                        { select * where {

                    } limit 1

question_text_en: What did the agent do with an object which is a subclass of Wine_1 at a position where the Y coordinate is greater than 0.14 after 2024-05-23T05:04:00 and before 2024-07-02T01:10:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Wine_1 .
            
                        
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("0.14"^^xsd:double < ?pos_y)
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-23T05:04:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-07-02T01:10:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

question_text_en: What did the agent do with an object whose attribute is containers in the toilet in less than 6 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:containers .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration < 6)
            
                        }  }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "toilet" .
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Breadslice .
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;

                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .

question_text_en: What did the agent do with an object which is a subclass of Decor at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -6.04 for less than or equal to 5 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Decor .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration <= 5)
            
                        }  }
                        
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-6.04"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:cover_object .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "livingroom" .
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-06-20T15:27:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-21T11:05:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
