            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:cream .
            
                        
                    {
                        select distinct * where {
                            ?event vh2kg:nextEvent+ ?next_event .
                            ?next_event vh2kg:action ac:put .
                            ?next_event vh2kg:mainObject ?next_object .
                            ?next_object rdfs:label "barsoap" .
                            ?event vh2kg:eventNumber ?event_number .
                        } order by desc(?event_number) limit 1
                    }
                    
                        }  }
                        
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .

                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .

question_text_en: What did the agent do with an object whose type is Carrot at a position where the X coordinate is greater than 0.23 after 2024-04-24T22:13:00 and before or at 2024-05-26T13:27:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Carrot .
                
                        
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
                    FILTER("0.23"^^xsd:double < ?pos_x)
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-24T22:13:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-05-26T13:27:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:OPEN .
            
                        
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-3.44"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-01T03:45:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-08T03:50:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:

            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .

                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:containers .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "toilet" .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-11T14:43:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-04-19T04:15:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

question_text_en: What did the agent do firstly with an object whose attribute is has_plug at a position where the X coordinate is greater than -3.64?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:has_plug .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                        } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                        
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
                    FILTER("-3.64"^^xsd:double < ?pos_x)
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>

                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:put .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
            
                    } order by desc(?end_time) }

                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .

                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x ;

question_text_en: What is the state of the object that an agent eats firstly at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -4.1?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:eat .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                    } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-4.1"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
                
                    
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:state ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOn .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-04T01:04:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-03T15:00:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                    }  }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .

                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

query:

            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>

            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>

                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOn .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration <= 18)
            
                    }  }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .

question_text_en: What are the width, height, and depth of the object scrubbed by an agent inside the bathroom lastly?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?size_x ?size_y ?size_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:scrub .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
            
                    } order by desc(?end_time) }
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "bathroom" .
            
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                
                } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>

                SELECT DISTINCT ?size_x ?size_y ?size_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:lookAt .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-10T18:52:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-07-07T01:01:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                    }  }
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("2.2"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
                
                    
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .

            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>

            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>

                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:find .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-15T07:59:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-05-17T15:34:00"^^xsd:dateTime)

            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?size_x ?size_y ?size_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                    } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-1.88"^^xsd:double > ?pos_z)
                
                    
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.space: at a position where the Z coordinate is less than -1.88

question_text_en: What is the type of the object that an agent drinks in the kitchen lastly?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:drink .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
            
                    } order by desc(?end_time) }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?object rdf:type ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?size_x ?size_y ?size_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:grab .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                    } order by asc(?begin_time) }

                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .

                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x ;

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:wipe .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-23T23:57:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-15T18:43:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                    }  }
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .

                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .

                    ?object vh2kg:attribute ?answer .

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?size_x ?size_y ?size_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:write .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                    } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.question: What are the width, height, and depth of the object?

question_text_en: What is the attribute of the object that an agent sits on in the toilet lastly?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:sit .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
            
                    } order by desc(?end_time) }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "toilet" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?object vh2kg:attribute ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What are the width, height, and depth of the object found by an agent at a position where the Z coordinate is less than -6.92 lastly?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?size_x ?size_y ?size_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:find .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
            
                    } order by desc(?end_time) }
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-6.92"^^xsd:double > ?pos_z)
                
                    
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the attribute of the object that an agent switches off in the bathroom after 2024-05-08T07:19:00 and before or at 2024-07-06T05:52:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOff .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-08T07:19:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-07-06T05:52:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                    }  }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "bathroom" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?object vh2kg:attribute ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

paraphrased_question_text_en: What type of object did the agent pour at a location where the X coordinate was less than -0.3 for more than 9 seconds?

question_text_en: What are the width, height, and depth of the object texted by an agent in the livingroom from 2024-04-05T20:47:00 to 2024-06-28T18:03:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?size_x ?size_y ?size_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:text .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-05T20:47:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-28T18:03:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                    }  }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.question: What are the width, height, and depth of the object?

paraphrased_question_text_en: Can you provide the width, height, and depth of the object that an agent sent a text about in the living room between 8:47 p.m. on April 5, 2024, and 6:03 p.m. on June 28, 2024?
